name: Gardian (Nicole Evans)
description:
Weeds and Aphids and Flies, Oh My!

Your poor garden has been overrun by pests, and they have destroyed all of your plants... except one! Leave your shovel aside, and use your fists to protect your final flower... but don't forget to water it!

Controls

Move - W,A,S,D 

Punch - Left Mouse

Water Flower - Right Click

Credits:

Neesarg Banglawala - Programmer

Barry Evans - Programmer

Jacob Freeland - Music and SFX

Nicole Frisella - 3D Artist

Parthvi Jariwala - Animator

02/05/20 - Game Jam
